title: Spin ROSE THEATRE Typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110429073224im_/http:/typophile.com/files/rose_6210.jpg)

Hi there,

Can anyone help me identify the font used for 'ROSE THEATRE'?

Thanks,  
Gray
author: GrayBuchanan

comments.content:
Ha, looks like this has happened before!

Thanks for the ID though Renko, Poplar is close enough for what I'm working on. :)
Yes, I noticed it later, when my brain rang »Aaaalaaarm. You have seen this before!« and I searched on typophile … ;^D
